comment.author: 64519085@N00
comment._content:
weight 166760 pounds. holy crap.

Also interesting that a shipbuilding company was required to build one of the first hightech wind tunnels.

comment.author: 96068413@N04
comment._content: Unfortunately, this photo has been mislabeled for years. This is actually the Variable Density Tunnel at the Newport News Shipbuilding and Dry Dock Company at the shipyards. It was sent to NASA Langley, then NACA, by barge and arrived in June 1922. See crgis.ndc.nasa.gov/historic/582.
